page.title: 15Life and Work
page.content: Mr. Scanlon lives in 'The Cottage",Filleigh and is Clerk of Works at West Buckland School.He has lived in the area for 23 years.He has worked at the school for over 2 years. He is responsible for the upkeep of the school buildings,some of which are 125 years old.He has been involved in a major effort to improve the school buildings and in the construction of new facilities for the girls who started attending the school 5 years ago. He likes living in Filleigh and likes the work eventhough he thinks he doesn't get paid much. In his spare time he mends clocks,rings bells and coaches badminton for the local club.The club is doing well eventhough he does not get many good players.
